sourcesContent:
<template>
            <v-text-field
            label="What do you want to do?"
            solo
            flat
            v-model="title"
            background-color="grey lighten-2"
            class="rounded-lg"
            required
            :rules="rule"
            @keypress.enter.prevent="submit"
            >
        <template v-slot:append>
        <v-btn 
        @click="submit" 
        :loading="loading" 
        v-show="title === ''"
        icon
       >
        <v-icon>
            mdi-plus
            </v-icon></v-btn>
        </template>
            </v-text-field>
     
</template>

<script>
export default {
data:() => ({
valid:true,
loading:false,
     title:'',
     id:null,
     completed:false,
 rule:[
     v => !!v ||'This field is required'
 ]
}),
methods:{
    submit(){
     if(this.valid){
       this.$store.dispatch('addItem',{
           todo:this.title,
           completed:this.completed,
           mode:'add'
       })
       .then(()=>{
           this.$refs.form.resetValidation()
           this.$refs.form.reset();
       })
     }
    },
},
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
